content.raw: As @hsu said, this error occurs when the world file cannot be found (the `--verbose` flag will indicate that). There are some problems with r2_gazebo repository that are unrelated to drcsim. I will fix them, but I haven't been able to reproduce @pbeeson 's problem unless I use the `atlas_v4_bringup.launch` file.
content.html: As @hsu said, this error occurs when the world file cannot be found (the --verbose flag will indicate that). There are some problems with r2_gazebo repository that are unrelated to drcsim. I will fix them, but I haven't been able to reproduce @pbeeson 's problem unless I use the atlas_v4_bringup.launch file.
